00027 #ifndef _CLF_FILE_H
00028 #define _CLF_FILE_H
00029 
00030 //
00031 #include "file/TsvFile/TsvFile.h"
00032 //
00033 #include "util/Err.h"
00034 //
00035 
00036 namespace affx {
00037   class ClfFile;
00038 };
00039 
00154 
00155 class affx::ClfFile {
00156 public:
00157   affx::TsvFile m_tsv; 
00158 
00160   //#%header0=probe_id  x       y
00161   int tsv->get(0,"probe_id",probe_id_string)" The...">probe_id; 
00162   int x;        
00163   int y;        
00164 
00166   ClfFile() {
00167     makeClfBindings();
00168   }
00170   ~ClfFile() {
00171   }
00172 
00174   int getXMax() {
00175     int val;
00176     int rv;
00177 
00178     rv=m_tsv.getHeader("rows",val);
00179     Err::check(rv==TSV_OK,"No 'rows' header found in clf file");
00180     return val-1; // 1-Based to 0-based
00181   }
00182 
00183   int getYMax() {
00184     int val;
00185     int rv;
00186 
00187     rv=m_tsv.getHeader("cols",val);
00188     Err::check(rv==TSV_OK,"No 'cols' header found in clf file");
00189     return val-1; // 1-Based to 0-based
00190   }
00191 
00194   int getSequential() {
00195     int val;
00196     int rv;
00197 
00198     rv=m_tsv.getHeader("sequential",val);
00199     if(rv==TSV_OK) {
00200         Err::check(val>=0,"sequential header in clf file must be a value >= 0");
00201         return val;
00202     }
00203     else
00204         return -1;
00205   }
00206 
00209   std::string getOrder() {
00210     std::string val;
00211     int rv;
00212 
00213     rv=m_tsv.getHeader("order",val);
00214     if(rv==TSV_OK) {
00215       Err::check(val.compare("row_major")==0 || val.compare("col_major")==0, "order header in clf file must be set to 'row_major' or 'col_major'");
00216       return val;
00217     }
00218     else {
00219       val.erase();
00220       return val;
00221     }
00222   }
00223 
00225   void makeClfBindings() {
00226     m_tsv.unbindAll();
00227     //
00228     m_tsv.bind(0,"probe_id",&tsv->get(0,"probe_id",probe_id_string)" The...">probe_id,TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00229     m_tsv.bind(0,"x",&x,TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00230     m_tsv.bind(0,"y",&y,TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00231   }
00232 
00236   int open(const std::string& filename) {
00237     std::string val;
00238     int rc = m_tsv.open(filename);
00239     if(rc == TSV_OK) {
00240       int rv=m_tsv.getHeader("clf_format_version",val);
00241       Err::check(rv==TSV_OK,"No clf_format_version header in clf file");
00242       Err::check(val.compare("1.0")==0,"Unable to handle clf file format");
00243     }
00244     return rc;
00245   }
00249   int write(const std::string& filename) {
00250     return m_tsv.writeTsv(filename);
00251   }
00254   int close() {
00255     return m_tsv.close();
00256   }
00259   int rewind() {
00260     return m_tsv.rewind();
00261   }
00264   int next_probe() {
00265     return m_tsv.nextLevel(0);
00266   }
00270   int defineFileClf(TsvFile* tsv) {
00271     Err::check(tsv!=NULL,"affx::ClfFile - no tsv file provided to defineFileClf");
00272     return tsv->defineFile("probe_id\tx\ty");
00273   }
00276   int defineFileClf() {
00277     return defineFileClf(&m_tsv);
00278   }
00279 };
